EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Mar15 Open Business Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the "New Business Acceptance: Building the Business Case" webinar. It will take place on February 12 at 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern / 4pm GMT. Please use the link below to add the event to your calendar, which contains the login information to access the webinar.
Add to Calendar: http://intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/New_Business_Acceptance_Webinar.ics
http://www.intapp.com
